query:
INSERT INTO task_comments (id, task_id, author_id, author_type, content, comment_type, parent_comment_id, mentions, metadata)
               VALUES ($1, $2, $3, $4, $5, $6, $7, $8, $9)
               RETURNING
                id as "id!: Uuid",
                task_id as "task_id!: Uuid",
                author_id,
                author_type as "author_type!: AuthorType",
                content,
                comment_type as "comment_type!: CommentType",
                parent_comment_id as "parent_comment_id: Uuid",
                mentions,
                metadata,
                created_at as "created_at!: DateTime<Utc>"
